name: Stock Inference
tagline: Stock inference engine using Apache Geode, SpringXD, Zeppelin and Spark ML Lib.
body:
# Readme

## Summary

Stock Inference engine using Apache Geode, SpringXD, Zeppelin and Spark ML Lib.

## Requirements

* Apache Spark 1.3.1
* Apache Zeppelin (Incubating)
* Apache Geode (Incubating)
* Spring XD 2.0 Snapshot

## Instructions

* [Apache Geode Lab](GeodeLab.md)
* [Apache SpringXD Lab](SpringXDLab.md)
* [Apache Spark Lab](SparkLab.md)
* [Apache Zeppelin Lab](ZeppelinLab.md)
